content.prompt: Which of the following is a characteristic of mitochondria and chloroplasts that supports the endosymbiotic theory?

choices.label: Both can reproduce on their own outside of the cell.
Both contain endoplasmic reticulum and Golgi bodies.
Both contain ribosomes that are identical to ribosomes of the eukaryotic cytoplasm.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
